Method Detail

opMatch

public boolean opMatch(java.lang.Class other)
Returns:
true if this and other are the same operator, disregarding arguments. OpMatch is used in preconditions for applying rules. This should be moved to the Op class if we ever apply rules to other than logical operators.

findLogProp

public abstract LogicalProperty findLogProp(ICatalog catalog,
                                            LogicalProperty[] input)
Determine the logical properties of this operator's output, given the logical properties of its inputs
